details.callToWorship: All Hail the Power of Jesus' Name #202
details.sermonTitle: The Witness of the Church Before Christ’s Second Coming

list: January 31: Men’s Discipleship Breakfast, 8:00 AM at Mark Deaton’s garage.
February 1: 5th annual chili cook-off. Please sign up to bring chili, cheese, crackers, desserts, etc.
February 10: Valentine Banquet at 6:00 PM in the Lewis Fellowship Hall. A signup sheet is in the foyer to get a head count.
March 28: Spring workday here at the church building from 10:00-2:00.
